attributes.agent_name: Motus Select George Kia New Cars
attributes.description:
With its eye-catching exterior styling, bold headlamps and muscular stance, the all-new KIA Seltos is a compact SUV like no other. Not that you would expect anything less from KIA: with one of the most awarded design teams in the world, state-of-the-art production technology and world-class quality credentials, the Seltos is the car you’ve been waiting for. 

All prices exclude metallic paint, administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Trade-ins will be considered.  We deliver nationwide. Contact Gianni or Jason at Kia George for more information. T’s & C’s Apply.
attributes.finance_estimate:

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Seltos 1.6 EX

attributes.agent_name: Motus Select George Kia New Cars
attributes.description:
People rely on you. The K2700 feels the same way. The first thought from the KIA engineers when designing the K2700 was to make sure that it never lets you down. The K2700 has the perfect workhorse engine – a 2.7 litre, 4 cylinder, J2 diesel power plant that delivers 62kW of power at and 165 Nm of torque at 2400 rpm. The K2700 has a 2 810 mm long deck and 1 630 mm wide bed, giving you abundant loading capacity. The railed truck bed has a low height of only 733 mm for easier access when loading and unloading. The easily operated catcher has a better grip thanks to its ergonomic handle and an inner spring to ensure smooth movement. For the organisation of small miscellaneous items, the front centre seatback folds down to reveal a multifunctional console for practical storage, in addition to a storage space within the centre console. Electric windows and an independent sliding & reclining driver’s seat ensure comfort and easy accessibility. The K2700 comes with a 5-year unlimited mileage mechanical warranty, 3 year 60 000km service plan, 5-year roadside assistance. 

All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Trade-ins will be considered.  We deliver nationwide. Contact Gianni or Jason at Kia George for more information. T’s & C’s Apply.

COME AND VIEW!
WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE, SERVICE THE WHOLE OF THE GAUTENG REGION AND WE ARE BASED JUST 40 MIN FROM JHB.

TRADE-INS WELCOME!
Why you must buy from Koos&Mike used cars:
1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)
2. All our cars comes with a AA/DEKRA roadworthy certificate.
3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.
4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility in our town.
5. Finance approvals is our goal.
6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.
7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.
8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)
9. We buy decent cars for cash.
10. We make a video of the cars delivery as a gift to the client.
11. Ts & Cs APPLY

attributes.title: 2011 Toyota FJ Cruiser 4.0 V6

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
